Name: Restaurant Dwars
Review Text: Fantastic restaurant with a very friendly and helpful host! The food was paired with a selection of beers. Great experience in a quieter part of town

Name: Restaurant Dwars
Review Text: The stuff is friendly but the chef is something of amazing. He is full of energy and he make very tasty disches. The kitchen is biologic and they have a lot of different kind of beer.  I come from italy and i live in amsterdam from a few years and this is obsolutly my favourite restourant in amsterdam .

Name: Restaurant Dwars
Review Text: Friendly bio restaurant! I like the beers and the good food. If you want to eat here, it's better to make an reservation to be sure you have a place.

Name: Restaurant Dwars
Review Text: For the adventurous people. Food combined with a special beer. Friendly staff who know about the food they serve. Tasty food at the heart of the Jordaan.

Name: Restaurant Dwars
Review Text: Great organic restaurant with nice atmosphere and good food. Helpful, knowledgeable and pleasant staff.

Name: Restaurant Dwars
Review Text: Excellent pairing of food and beers.
